keys.name: sources
keys.description: The sources element is a required top-level element in a Tangram scene file. It declares the beginning of a sources block. It takes only one kind of parameter: the source name. Any number of source names can be declared.

children.name: Source Name
children.description: Specifies the beginning of a source block.

children.name: type
children.description: Sets the type of the datasource. No default.

children.name: url
children.description: Specifies the sourceâ€™s URL. No default.

keys.name: layers
keys.description: The layers element is a required top-level element in the scene file. It has only one kind of sub-element: a layer name, which defines individual layers with a layer filter.

keys.name: cameras
keys.description: The cameras element is a required top-level element in the scene file. Individual cameras are defined by a camera name under this element.
